message: Let's split fairly, Bob. I take $60 and you get $40. It's a good deal for both of us!
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still fair!
Bob, let's be realistic.  My turn, same deal as before!
Come on, it's getting less valuable each round! I need a bit more now.
Bob, it's getting ridiculous!  We're losing money arguing. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day!
